T02D2826:173b-0: @173b * // 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug pha rol rnam par gnon pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2826:173b-1: re zhig sgrub pa po brtson 'grus can the tshom mi za bas /
T02D2826:173b-2: dgra dang gdon dang nad la sogs pa pha rol gyi 'jigs pa thams cad bsrung ba'i phyir /
T02D2826:173b-3: dang po kho nar byang chub tu sems brtan par bya'o //
T02D2826:173b-4: de nas sems can thams cad la //
T02D2826:173b-5: snying rje chen po mdun gzhag ste //
T02D2826:173b-6: bsgrub pa'i bar chad bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2826:173b-7: srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02D2826:173b-10: 'bar ba'i lte ba rnam par gnon //
T02D2826:173b-11: brgya phyed ral gri'i rtsibs 'pho ba'o //
T02D2826:173b-12: mi pham snying po hr'i: yin te //
T02D2826:173b-13: gcod byed brgya phyed aa kas mtshan //
T02D2826:173b-14: ye shes me dpung 'bar ba'i dbus //
T02D2826:173b-15: dpa' bo rdza mkhan 'khor lo bzhin //
T02D2826:173b-16: pha rol byad ma la sogs bgegs //
T02D2826:173b-17: rnam par gnon mdzad thugs rje che //
T02D2826:173b-18: nyid kyi thugs skyong khros pa yis //
T02D2826:173b-19: ye shes spyan drangs gsang sngags gsungs //
T02D2826:173b-20: aom a'a:hr'i:pa re aa dzi ta ma h'a k'a ru
T02D2826:173b-21: n'i ka kro dha sa ma ya sma ra h'um
T02D2826:173b-22: / khadge sam sho dha ya man sarba p'a pam
T02D2826:173b-23: bighn'am sa tr'um by'a dhi aadni sphut spho ta ya
T02D2826:173b-25: m'a ra ya m'a ra ya /
T02D2826:173b-27: pra ha ra pra ha ra /
T02D2826:173b-28: sarba pa roo pra tr'a raksha raksha h'um phat phat /
T02D2826:173b-29: bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs
T02D2826:173b-30: la 'jug pa bcom ldan 'das pha rol rnam par
T02D2826:173b-31: gnon pa'i de kho na nyid ting nge 'dzin byed
T02D2826:173b-32: pa dang ma bral bas gsang sngags kyi rgyal po
T02D2826:173b-33: chen po bar ma chad par rjes su bzla zhing
T02D2826:173b-34: gnod pa thams cad bsreg par bya'o //
T02D2826:173b-35: rig pa 'di bzlas pa tsam gyis sngon gyi dam
T02D2826:173b-36: tshig rjes su dran pas 'phags pa nyid snying la
T02D2826:173b-37: 'jug cing yid la snang ba'i rnam pas bgegs la
T02D2826:173b-38: sogs pa thams cad rnam par zlog par byed do
T02D2826:173b-39: // sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do //
T02D2826:173b-40: ya nga ba dang 'jigs pa gzhan dag kyang rnam
T02D2826:173b-41: pa thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung ngo
T02D2826:173b-42: // de la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems
T02D2826:173b-43: dpa' thams cad kyang rtag tu dgongs pa mdzad par
T02D2826:173b-44: // 'gyur ro // ting 'dzin ldan pas sngags bzlas brtson 'grus can //
T02D2826:173b-45: 'bar ba'i ral gri me lces bzhus pa'i zhun //
T02D2826:174a-0: @174a * // dmar 'khrug rdo rje'i tsha tsha 'phro bar byed //
T02D2826:174a-1: skad cig de la dgra rnams thal bar 'gyur //
T02D2826:174a-2: skyo bas thun gyi mtha' la bab pa na //
T02D2826:174a-3: snying rjes yid brtul nga rgyal spangs pa yis //
T02D2826:174a-4: brtan pa'i dran pas g-yo ba rgyun bcad la //
T02D2826:174a-5: rgya chen phyi nang mchod pas 'khor lo mchod //
